bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Environment and Public Works Fair Share Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal Aid to Wildlife Restoration Act to require the Federal formula for allocating funds to States under such Act to use the population figures from the latest available estimates prepared by the Department of Commerce for each State (currently, from the latest decennial census). Makes an identical change with respect to the Federal formula used for grants to States for interstate highway systems, Federal-aid urban highways, and highway safety programs (the Federal aid highway program)
